quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Jack Nicholson
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, detail. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In 2004 Lindsay Lohan dated the actor Wilmer Valderrama.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: You cant handle the truth. is a famous Jack Nicholson quote from what movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Few Good Men

questions.question: With 3 of Jack Nicholson Oscar wins, his female costar in the respective movie has also won an Oscar.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In The Raven, Jack Nicholson gets to perform with Boris Karloff and Vincent Price, and Peter Lorre.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In this non-musical MTV show, a practical joke was played on Lindsay Lohan- the show crew made her believe that a vehicle had been stolen. Can you remember the name of the show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Punkd

questions.question: Which of these performers has Jack Nicholson not appeared in a movie with?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul Newman

questions.question: On July 2nd 1986, Lindsay Morgan Lohan was born to  Dina and Michael Lohan in New York City, New York. She was then raised in this town.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cold Spring Harbor, New York

questions.question: Lohan signed a recording contract with Casablanca Records in 2004, and her debut album was released on 7th of December of the same year.  What was the name of the album?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Speak

questions.question: Lindsay began her career at this age, as a model of Ford Academy. Finding work as a child model was rather difficult at first, because her auburn hair and freckled face werent very popular.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: Lindsay entered the world of pop music when she signed a five-album production deal with Emilio Estefan in 2002. In 2003, she performed this song for the Freaky Friday soundtrack.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ultimate

questions.question: Which of these movies did Jack Nicholson not appear in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Score

questions.question: In a 2004 movie, Lindsay Lohan played a girl who lived in Africa for her first 15 years. Suddenly, she has to learn what high school in the U.S. means and how to survive it (this is true). The movie was a Disney production.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the film The Last Detail Jack Nicholsons character works in the oil fields, but is really an accomplished pianist.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Where does he get all those wonderful toys? is a quote from what Jack Nicholson film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Batman

questions.question: What 1958 movie marked Jack Nicholsons debut as an actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Cry Baby Killer

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Morgan Freeman and Comedian
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, clancy, one-liners. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Morgan Freeman portrayed this character in two films, based on the novels of James Patterson and released in 1997 and in 2001.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr. Alex Cross

questions.question: This English-born American comedian, who was also a violinist, is well known for his “one-liners, which were short and simple but at the same time very effective.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Henny Youngman

questions.question: A grandmother is watching her grandchild playing on the beach when a huge wave comes and takes him out to sea. She pleads, please God, save my only grandson. I beg of you, bring him back. And a big wave comes and washes the boy back onto the beach, good as new. She looks up to heaven and says: He had a hat!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Myron Cohen

questions.question: Morgan Freeman co-starred with Anthony Hopkins in this 1997 movie based on an actual event in U.S. history.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Amistad

questions.question: For which movie did Morgan Freeman receive an Academy Award for best supporting actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Million Dollar Baby

questions.question: Which famous American comedian made this ironic statement about marriage?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brian Kiley

questions.question: Morgan Freeman has starred with Clint Eastwood in more than one movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This famous one-liners author starred along Roberto Benigni in 2003s, Coffee and Cigarettes.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steven Wright

questions.question: Although this comedian initially considered becoming a lawyer, he eventually got into comedy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul Rodriguez

questions.question: What childrens show was Morgan Freeman on in the 1970s?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Electric Company

questions.question: This comedian dropped out of high school to pursue a show business career and became one of the most popular stand-up comedians in the United States, due to the casual, razor-sharp wit of her performances. Here is a line delivered by her.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paula Poundstone

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Sum of All Fears

options.text: Sorry, I wasnt listening for the last 12 years..

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No hablo ingles.

questions.question: Finish this old joke by famous comedian Steven Wright: I went to a restaurant with a sign that said they served breakfast at any time. So I ordered French toast ____
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: during the Renaissance

questions.question: Morgan Freeman is an advocate for Black History Month.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Antonio Banderas and Pacino
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, alfredo. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: World famous actor Antonio Banderas once had another dream concerning his career. What was the job of his dreams, when he was a child?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a professional soccer-player

questions.question: Antonio Banderas, who speaks English, sings in Spanish and plays in a many Latin American movies, was born in which country?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Spain

questions.question: In 2001, this award was given to Al Pacino for his outstanding contribution to the entertainment field.

options.text: The Special Oscar for Lifetime Achievement
The Special Oscar  for Humanitarian Work
The Bernard Baruch Award for Stage Work

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Cecil B. DeMille Award

questions.question: Al Pacino attended which Middle School in The Bronx?

options.text: The Middle School for Performing Arts

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hermann Ridder Junior High School

questions.question: Al Pacino won a Tony Award, a Drama Desk Award and a Theater World Award for his role in which play?

options.text: Does the Tiger Wear a Necktie?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Does the Tiger Wear a Necktie?

questions.question: Does actor Antonio Banderas have siblings?

options.text: He has a brother and a sister

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He has a brother

questions.question: Which two famous actors were acting teachers of Al Pacino?

options.text: Uta Hagen and Lee J. Cobb

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Charles Laughton and Lee Strassberg

questions.question: Did Antonio Banderas receive a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 2005?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What does Antonio Banderas surname actually mean in Spanish?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: flags

questions.question: In 1993, Al Pacino received Academy Award nominations for Best Actor and Best Supporting Actor, for which two movies?

options.text: Scent of a Woman and Glengarry Glen Ross
Scent of a Woman and Dog Day Afternoon
The Godfather Part II and And Justice for All
The Godfather Part II and  Bang the Drum Slowly

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scent of a Woman and Glengarry Glen Ross

questions.question: Actor Alfredo James Pacino was born in The Bronx, New York on what date?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: April 25,1940

questions.question: Antonio Banderas starred in the movie Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown, directed by Pedro Almodóvar.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In 2004, Al Pacino became the 18th performer to win the Triple Crown of Acting, which includes which three acting awards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oscar, Tony and Emmy

questions.question: In a Playboy magazine interview, Al Pacino claimed that he was fired from his job as a movie theater usher for what reason?

options.text: He spent too much time watching the movies
He was caught admiring himself in a mirror
He memorized the lines of the star actors and said them out loud

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was caught admiring himself in a mirror

questions.question: Paramount executives offered the role of Michael Corleone to Al Pacino, after seeing him play the role of a drug addict in which movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Panic in Needle Park
